lead_paragraph: The detail emerged in a Westchester County court in the case against Julius Reich, who has been charged with second-degree murder in the death of Dr. Robin Goldman, his wife.

headline.main: Scarsdale Man Stabbed Wife 21 Times, Prosecutor Says
headline.print_headline: Man Stabbed Wife 21 Times, Prosecutor Says

abstract: Westchester County, NY, prosecutor says Julius Reich, who has been charged with murdering his wife Dr Robin Goldman, stabbed her 21 times in shower at their Scarsdale home.
